"Xiera": "Talises are <red>throwing weapons<c> that can hit enemies from a distance."

"Their most important feature is that after you throw them, they <red>remain where you threw them<c> for a short time, during which any Techniques you cast will come from the Talis instead of yourself."
"Try throwing the Talis with its Normal Attack, then using a <red>charged Technique<c>."

"・Use a Normal Attack with <%NormalAttack>
・Charge and cast a Technique
\u3000with <%PhotonArts>"

"・Use a Normal Attack with <%NormalAttack>
・Charge and cast a Technique
\u3000with <%PhotonArts> or <%MainPaletteC>"

"Talis is a unique teching weapon that lets you throw a card and cast Techniques from the thrown card.

A Talis gives you additional options in battle, such as throwing it into an area you cannot enter yourself and casting Techniques from within it."
